creator: info@klawitter.de
text: This option is needed to create parsers containing java 5.0 specific syntax.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
well, in that case we will welcome a patch + tests and documentation, all as SVN
diff -u format, please. If you can do that, I will commit it before the next
version of Ant ships.

Created attachment 18558
patch to  add jdkversion attribute for the javacc task

Hope the formatting is what you're looking for.  I patched against the latest
svn snapshot.
creator: rafi@cs.caltech.edu
stevel@apache.org
text:
Patched in SVN head, with the docs updated. An example of what a jdk version for
the docs would be nice, along with a junit or antunit test that worked on
pre-java1.5 runtimes...

Steve has committed the change.
I guess one needs to read the javacc docs to
get the valid values for this attribute.
creator: peterreilly@apache.org
